content.text: We are a leading technology store in Ho Chi Minh City, offering a wide range of products including CPUs, GPUs, motherboards, RAM, SSDs, keyboards, and more. Our store is located at 203 Nguyễn Thượng Hiền, P6 Quận Bình Thạnh, TPHCM. Our operating hours are from Monday to Saturday, 9:00 AM to 6:30 PM, and on Sunday, 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
You can reach us by phone at +84 946700006 or email us at support@hotgear.vn. For any technical issues, you can contact us at +84 944567186 or +84 936054002.

Here are some popular products we offer: 
1. i9 13900k
2. i7 13700k
3. bàn phím cơ asus rog
4. cửa hàng máy tính
5. rx 6700 xt
6. i5 13600k

8. CPU AMD 9000 Series

10. VGA ĐÃ QUA SỬ DỤNG ( 2ND )

12. cpu intel core ultra

14. Main Z890
For any inquiries or to place an order, you can call us at +84 946700006. You can also chat with us via Zalo or Messenger.

Hotgear is a leading technology store in Vietnam. We offer a wide range of products, and our team of experts is always ready to help you find the best solutions for your needs. Visit our blog for the latest technology news and trends.

Here are some of our policies: 
1. Warranty Policy
2. Payment Methods
3. Delivery and Shipping
4. No Interest Installment Payments
5. Privacy Policy
For any issues with your order, you can contact our customer support team at +84 905034321. Our operating hours are from Monday to Saturday, 9:00 AM to 6:30 PM.
